title.narrative: F.a: National advocacy project on the issue of punishment of sexual violence in South Kivu

description.narrative: One of the special characteristics of the conflict in Congo has been of the raw and systematic violence against women and girls. Sexual violence takes place in the eastern part of the conflict and the systematic impunity is a fundamental problem: the autho rities are intervening a very limited number of cases and the judicial system does not have enough resources for effective work. The aim is to fight against the impunity of the sexual violence crimes by providing legal assistance to victims of sexual viole nce and raising awareness of sexual violence in the legal context. The target groups are the victims of sexual violence, women and girls and their families . Action des Droits des chretiens Activistes de l' Homme a Shabunda ACADHOSHA is an organization fou nded in 2001 that works in South Kivu in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC). The organization works, especially in remote areas of Shabunda y Mwenga . The organization's goal is to promote respect for human rights, especially women's and children's rights, as well as to work in order to eliminate impunity, discrimination and violence . www.acadhosha.org
